plugins.name: playwright-plugin
plugins.description: Browser automation with Playwright. Auto-detects dev servers, writes clean test scripts, and autonomously handles any browser task.

plugins.name: tmux-plugin
plugins.description: Remote control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs (python, gdb, etc.) by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output

plugins.name: windmill-plugin
plugins.description: Assist with Windmill platform development. Guide agents working on Windmill codebase and creating Windmill projects

plugins.name: gemini-imagegen-plugin
plugins.description: Generate and edit images using the Gemini API. Supports text-to-image, image editing, multi-turn refinement, and composition.

plugins.name: skill-development-plugin
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective Claude Code skills following progressive disclosure principles

plugins.name: codex-plugin
plugins.description: Invoke Codex CLI for automated code analysis, refactoring, and editing workflows
